metadata.title: firefox: thunderbird: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 134, Thunderbird 134, Firefox ESR 128.6, and Thunderbird 128.6 (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Firefox. The Mozilla Foundation's Security Advisory describes the following issue: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 133, Thunderbird 133, Firefox ESR 128.5, and Thunderbird 128.5. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat Product Security rates the severity of this flaw as determined by the Mozilla Foundation Security Advisory.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
thunderbird is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
